name: GM-89 Underbarrel Heavy Munition
effect: Attach a grenade launcher to the underbarrel of a Main RIfle or CQB weapon. It may be fired as a Quick Action as a separate weapon, with Loading, Arcing, and 1d6 Explosive Damage with a Blast 1 pattern and Range 10.
description: The GM-89 is simple in concept - a 200mm explosive shell launcher bolted to the underbarrel of a suitable weapon, and slaved to the Mobile Suit's targeting system.

name: Rocket Impulse System
effect: When you successfully Barrage with this weapon, it will deal +2 Kinetic damage and force the target to move 1 space in a direction of your choice. On a critical hit, you may instead force the target to move 3 spaces. If the target strikes Heavy cover, they are immediately knocked Prone.

name: Napalm Shells
effect: All bonus damage becomes Burn damage. The blast radius of this weapon is also set aflame, and will inflict Burn 1 on anyone who moves through it until the end of your next turn.

name: Folding Stock
effect: Reduce this weapon's range by 2. Gain access to the Fold Stock quick action.

actions.name: Fold Stock
actions.detail: The weapon this mod is attached to gains +1 difficulty to all attacks, but benefits from +1 threat range. The stock can be unfolded as another quick action, restoring the weapon's original Threat and accuracy.

name: Pistol Grip
effect: The weapon gains +2 Accuracy, but its damage profile is reduced solely to damage rolled by dice or Reliable effects. "Flat" damage must be ignored - thus, a weapon with a 1d6+4 damage profile, would become a weapon with a 1d6 damage profile.
description: An optional hilt adjustment for various melee weapons, the pistol grip is an old fashioned type of hilt intended to augment the user's fine control of a blade, at the expense of killing power. Intended for gentlemanly duels, this modification is seldom seen on the battlefield - but a few eccentrics find it familiar and indispensable in duels with enemy mobile suits, when landing the first strike can mean life or death.

added_tags.name: ACCURATE
added_tags.description: Attacks made with this weapon receive +1 Accuracy.

name: 'Bishop' Minovsky Supercharger
effect: Pick one Main or larger weapon without the Reliable or Overkill tags. That weapon gains Reliable (4) and 1 Heat (Self)

added_tags.name: RELIABLE {VAL}
added_tags.description: This weapon has some degree of self-correction or is simply powerful enough to cause damage even with a glancing blow. It always does {VAL} damage, even if it misses its target or rolls less damage. Reliable damage inherits other tags (such as AP) and base damage type but not tags that require a hit, such as Knockback.

added_tags.name: HEAT {VAL} (SELF)
added_tags.description: Immediately after using this weapon or system, the user takes {VAL} Heat.

name: Enhanced Traversal Hydraulics
effect: 1/Round, upon resolving a successful attack within your Sensors range, you may take 1d3+2 heat to make another attack with the same weapon at another target within Sensors range as a free action.

name: Aural Suppression Suite
effect: This weapon may be used 1/round while Hidden without removing the Hidden status.

name: Twin Barrel
effect: This weapon has been fitted with an additional barrel, augmenting its destructive capabilities in exchange for an overall less stable weapons platform. Thus, upon hitting a target, the weapon deals an additional amount of damage equal to half its "theoretical average" damage. Additionally, the weapon deals 2 Heat to the wielder whenever it is fired.

tags.name: UNIQUE
tags.description: This weapon or system cannot be duplicated â€“ each character can only have one copy of it installed at a time.

name: Radiator Fins
effect: Reduces a weapon's "Heat: Self" value by 1. Additionally, at the end of any turn in which you do not fire this weapon, reduce your Heat by 1.
